thread.title: Kim S.
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Kim S.

author: Kim S.
title: Kim S.
text: I could not attend the funeral that was three days away. Never ordered from this site before and needed a large patriotic arrangement delivered quickly. The arrangement was priced fairly with several choices to select from. I received constant emails about the progress and delivery. It arrived on time even though a disclaimer said it might not because of time and delivery issues with only 3 days to process. I heard from attendees that it smelled great and looked beautiful and appropriate for the occasion. I will order again.
